content: learn to knit this cheeky little triceratops a beautiful little soft toy with move-able legs a perfect gift for any child or yourself a pattern for beginner to intermediate level written in english knitted with straight needles this pattern is simple and easy to follow this listing is for the pattern only not the finished item once you have purchased you will receive a pdf file containing the pattern you will need dk weight yarn 3 25mm needles toy stuffing yarn needle scissors copyright you do not have permission to distribute for free or profit copies of this pattern in printed electronic or any other format
